Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class SupplyContainer.AcceptStrategy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.SupplyContainer.AcceptStrategy
Enclosing class:
SupplyContainer
public static class SupplyContainer.AcceptStrategy extends Object
A list of static functions that return common TriPredicate that can be used as accept/remove policy for a SupplyContainer.

    • maxOneType

      public static TriPredicate<SupplyContainer,​WarehouseObjectType,​DepotID> maxOneType​(int max)
      The SupplyContainer can accept only the specified supply type from any depot type and only if it is not full
      Parameters:
      max - number of resources to full it
      Returns:
      TriPredicate that can be used as accept/remove policy for a SupplyContainer (if the condition is satisfied)

    • maxOneTypeNotPresentIn

      public static TriPredicate<SupplyContainer,​WarehouseObjectType,​DepotID> maxOneTypeNotPresentIn​(int max, SupplyContainer... scs)
      Manages the three SupplyContainer(s) of the Warehouse. Those containers have to contain 1, 2 or 3 resources different from the other two containers
      Parameters:
      max - number of resources to full it (1, 2 or 3)
      scs - containers that can't contain the same resource of this one
      Returns:
      TriPredicate that can be used as accept/remove policy for a SupplyContainer (if the condition is satisfied)

    • maxSpecificType

      public static TriPredicate<SupplyContainer,​WarehouseObjectType,​DepotID> maxSpecificType​(WarehouseObjectType type, int max)
      The SupplyContainer can contain a maximum number of a specified WarehouseObjectType
      Parameters:
      type - of the resource
      max - number of resources
      Returns:
      TriPredicate that can be used as accept/remove policy for a SupplyContainer (if the condition is satisfied)
